item.description: Where are you trying to ride some bikes and trains? Belgium France Gernany Morocco Netherlands Spain United Kingdom More coming soon Links Legend: Bike ticket required (day pass) Bike ticket required (trip pass) Space limited Advance reservation required (space limited) Printed ticket required - to be picked up at station Printed ticket required - to be sent in the mail No online reservation possible, must be in person Free and unrestricted Must be in a bag, folded, treated as luggage, etc.
